Text.Page:
Thulsa has distilled a deadly vapor from rotting corpses, and infused it throughout the Ebon Tower.

Entering without protection is, to be blunt, suicidal.

I've made a purification totem for the federation, but there's a problem. I need argon cores to power it. "Cores from argons?"

Exactly, . There's some strange resonance between Thulsa and the argons. Thulsa doesn't control the argons, but they're on the same wavelength, if you will.

Anyway, bring me argon cores, and I'll make you a purification totem.

Try the Labyrinth of Terror. Plenty of argons there!

Ah, this is enough to make a purification totem.

You're better than I thought. Good job!
Bring me argon cores, and I'll give you a purification totem to protect you from the poison air of the Ebon Tower.
